## Exploratory Data Analysis

### Library Imports


```{r library-imports, quietely=TRUE, warn.conflicts=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

```


### Load the csv data

```{r load-data}

beers <- read.csv("../../../data/Beers.csv")
breweries <- read.csv("../../../data/Breweries.csv")

```

## Test Analyis

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r eda}

head(beers)

head(breweries)

```
